name: Gimbal
headline: Web Application Performance Auditing
description: Auditing web application performance in a simple and automated way. Gimbal can help maintain performance budgets from your CLI or a CI system and comment results on a GitHub pull request.

content.title: Keep Pull Requests Within Performance Budgets
